sources.title: Skyway
sources.description: Title: Skyway Summary: A cocky young pilot, at the urging of his girlfriend, takes a nice, "safe" job at the bank where her father is president. Directed by: Lewis D. Collins Actors: Production Company: W.T. Lackey Productions Release Date: 30 August 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A cocky young pilot, at the urging of his girlfriend, takes a nice, "safe" job at the bank where her father is president.

sources.title: Skyway (1933) HIGH FLYING ROMANCE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Ray Walker, Kathryn Crawford, Arthur Vinton
Director: Lewis D. Collins

A daredevil pilot is so crazy for a gal, that he quits flying and takes a job at her father's bank. But when framed as an embezzler, the love-crazed airman takes off in his amphibious plane to bring back the real thief!

metadata.Plot: A cocky young pilot, at the urging of his girlfriend, takes a nice, "safe" job at the bank where her father is president.
metadata.Actors: Ray Walker, Kathryn Crawford, Arthur Vinton
